items.summary: Add the user-provided logo image `frgmtlogo.png` to the frontend static assets (under `frontend/public/assets/`) and replace the current header branding (icon + “GlobalFreight”) with this logo image and the company name “Di Logisolutions”. The header logo must link to the Home page and render correctly in both light and dark themes.

Update company/contact details everywhere they appear in the UI (footer and contact details components at minimum) to use the exact user-provided information: Office Address: “Di LOGISOLUTIONS, A89, ROAD NO 2, MAHIPALPUR, NEW DELHI,110037”; Phone: “+91-9568740074” and “011-41447376”; Email: “info@dilss.in”; Company name: “Di Logisolution”; Registered address: “RZK-2/326-I, Khasra No. 85/17, Block K-2, Nihal Vihar, Nangaloi, West Delhi, Delhi, 11004”.

Replace remaining “GlobalFreight” brand mentions in marketing copy headings/titles (e.g., Home/About hero headings and “Why Choose …” section headings) with the updated company branding so the site consistently reflects “Di Logisolutions/Di Logisolution” rather than “GlobalFreight”.
